text: we've been brought me this morning about
an hour's drive outside the city of

the Azov battalion there is going to be

in the coming days or weeks these men
will be absolutely crucial to its
defense Azov battalion and several

after the rebellion here in the east of

and this group the Azov is known to be
one of the most effective and feared of
those volunteer groups it also has a
reputation for having a hard right-wing

accused of having neo-nazis in its ranks
but for the Ukrainian government the
most important thing about these groups
is that unlike the regular Ukrainian
military which has low morale these men
are all volunteers ultimately that means
them are committed and they're willing
to fight and to die for the cause of
Ukrainian nationalists
